ai_flow.plugin_interface package¶

Submodules¶

ai_flow.plugin_interface.blob_manager_interface module¶

class ai_flow.plugin_interface.blob_manager_interface.BlobManager(config: Dict)[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

A BlobManager is responsible for uploading and downloading files and resource for an execution of an ai flow project.

cleanup_project(workflow_snapshot_id, remote_path: str)[source]¶

clean up the project files downloaded or created during this execution. :param workflow_snapshot_id: It is the unique identifier for each workflow generation. :param remote_path: The project package uri.

abstract download_project(workflow_snapshot_id, remote_path: str, local_path: Optional[str] = None) → str[source]¶

download the needed resource from remote blob server to local process for remote execution.

Parameters

  • workflow_snapshot_id – It is the unique identifier for each workflow generation.

  • remote_path – The project package uri.

  • local_path – Download file root path.

:return Local project path.

abstract upload_project(workflow_snapshot_id: str, project_path: str) → str[source]¶

upload a given project to blob server for remote execution.

Parameters

  • workflow_snapshot_id – It is the unique identifier for each workflow generation.

  • project_path – the path of this project.

:return the uri of the uploaded project file in blob server.

class ai_flow.plugin_interface.blob_manager_interface.BlobManagerFactory[source]¶

Bases: object

static get_blob_manager(config: Dict[str, str]) → ai_flow.plugin_interface.blob_manager_interface.BlobManager[source]¶

ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface module¶

class ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobController[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Used for control an executable job to specific platform when it’s scheduled to run in workflow scheduler. The controller is able to control the lifecycle of a workflow job. Users can also implement custom job controller with their own job type.

abstract cleanup_job(job_handle: ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle, job_runtime_env: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv)[source]¶

Clean up temporary resources created during this execution. :param job_runtime_env: The job runtime environment. Type: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv :param job_handle: The job handle that contains the necessary information for an execution.

abstract get_job_status(job_handle: ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle) → ai_flow.workflow.status.Status[source]¶

Return the job status.

abstract get_result(job_handle: ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle, blocking: bool = True) → object[source]¶

Return the job result. :param job_handle: The job handle that contains the necessary information for an execution. :param blocking: blocking is true: Wait for the job to finish and return the result of the job.

blocking is false: If the job is running, return None.

If the job is finish, return the result of job.

property log: logging.Logger¶

Returns a logger. This logger is used as a log for control jobs

abstract stop_job(job_handle: ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle, job_runtime_env: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv)[source]¶

Stop a ai flow job. :param job_runtime_env: The job runtime environment. Type: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv :param job_handle: The job handle that contains the necessary information for an execution.

abstract submit_job(job: ai_flow.workflow.job.Job, job_runtime_env: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv) → ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle[source]¶

Submit an executable job to run. :param job_runtime_env: The job runtime environment. Type: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv :param job: A job object that contains the necessary information for an execution. :return job_handle: a job handle that maintain the handler of a job runtime.

class ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle(job: ai_flow.workflow.job.Job, job_execution: ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.JobExecutionInfo)[source]¶

Bases: ai_flow.util.json_utils.Jsonable

JobHandle is created by JobController. When call submit_job function, then return a JobHandle. Using JobHandle, you can get the job information.

Bases: abc.ABC

property config¶
abstract delete_workflow(project_name: str, workflow_name: str) → ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.WorkflowInfo[source]¶

Delete the workflow from scheduler. :param project_name: The project name. :param workflow_name: The workflow name. :return: The workflow information.

abstract get_job_executions(job_name: str, workflow_execution_id: str) → List[ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.JobExecutionInfo][source]¶

Get the job execution information by job name. :param job_name: The job name. :param workflow_execution_id: The workflow execution id. :return: The job execution information.

abstract get_workflow_execution(workflow_execution_id: str) → Optional[ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.WorkflowExecutionInfo][source]¶

Get the workflow execution information. :param workflow_execution_id: The workflow execution id. :return: The workflow execution information.

abstract list_job_executions(workflow_execution_id: str) → List[ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.JobExecutionInfo][source]¶

List the job execution information by the workflow execution id. :param workflow_execution_id: The workflow execution id. :return: The job execution information.

abstract list_workflow_executions(project_name: str, workflow_name: str) → List[ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.WorkflowExecutionInfo][source]¶

List all workflow executions by workflow name. :param project_name: The project name. :param workflow_name: The workflow name. :return: The workflow execution information.

abstract pause_workflow_scheduling(project_name: str, workflow_name: str) → ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.WorkflowInfo[source]¶

Make the scheduler stop scheduling the workflow. :param project_name: The project name. :param workflow_name: The workflow name. :return: The workflow information.

abstract restart_job_execution(job_name: str, workflow_execution_id: str) → ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.JobExecutionInfo[source]¶

Make the scheduler restart a job execution. If job status is running, first stop the job and then start it. :param job_name: The job name. :param workflow_execution_id: The workflow execution id. :return: The job execution information.

abstract resume_workflow_scheduling(project_name: str, workflow_name: str) → ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.WorkflowInfo[source]¶

Make the scheduler resume scheduling the workflow. :param project_name: The project name. :param workflow_name: The workflow name. :return: The workflow information.

abstract start_job_execution(job_name: str, workflow_execution_id: str) → ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.JobExecutionInfo[source]¶

Make the scheduler start a new job execution. :param job_name: The job name. :param workflow_execution_id: The workflow execution id. :return: The job execution information.

abstract start_new_workflow_execution(project_name: str, workflow_name: str) → Optional[ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.WorkflowExecutionInfo][source]¶

Make the scheduler new a workflow execution. :param project_name: The project name. :param workflow_name: The workflow name. :return: The workflow execution information.

abstract stop_all_workflow_execution(project_name: str, workflow_name: str) → List[ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.WorkflowExecutionInfo][source]¶

Stop all workflow execution of the workflow. :param project_name: The project name. :param workflow_name: The workflow name. :return: The workflow execution information.

abstract stop_job_execution(job_name: str, workflow_execution_id: str) → ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.JobExecutionInfo[source]¶

Make the scheduler stop the job execution. :param job_name: The job name. :param workflow_execution_id: The workflow execution id. :return: The job execution information.

abstract stop_workflow_execution(workflow_execution_id: str) → Optional[ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.WorkflowExecutionInfo][source]¶

Stop the workflow execution by execution id. :param workflow_execution_id: The workflow execution id. :return: The workflow execution information.

abstract submit_workflow(workflow: ai_flow.workflow.workflow.Workflow, project_context: ai_flow.context.project_context.ProjectContext) → ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.WorkflowInfo[source]¶

Submit the workflow to scheduler. :param workflow: ai_flow.workflow.workflow.Workflow type. :param project_context: ai_flow.context.project_context.ProjectContext type. :return: The workflow information.
